website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for scrimmages, these classic PUGG goals weigh only 7 pounds and fold down small.
pros: Set of two goals, pegs, spare parts kit, and carrying bag
Sets up easily with a quick twist
Goals measure 6-feet wide by 3.5 feet high by 3.5 feet deep
Works on grass, sand, and turf
Very durable and easy to set up
cons: Sets of one goal and two goals are available, so be sure to select the option you want

customer_reviews.title: Fun and easy to store!
customer_reviews.text: I went back and forth between the 4 foot and 6 foot goals. My kids are 7, so I finally decided on 6 foot and I’m glad I did. They are not huge opened up or folded away. They seem really sturdy for just a back yard game or practicing. The kids can easily unfold them by themselves but it takes me a minute to remember the direction to twist to fold them up (it’s still really easy, just takes a moment of concentration) I haven’t compared these with less expensive ones but I think quality is probably worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love these goals Pugg is the BEST
customer_reviews.text: Can’t beat the Pugg quality. I purchased the 6 foot version and I am glad I did. These goals are perfect for my U8 team practice. I also use these at home for my 7 and 9 year old to do drills and play small 2 on 2 games with the neighbors. A little difficult to fold at first, but I am starting to get the hang of the counter clockwise fold. I’ve seen a lot of coaches who get a different brand to save money and they regret it. Glad I didn’t make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: We only used these nets for one winter (we live in AZ so winter is our outdoor time). We bought them last Christmas for a present for my son. They were great while they lasted but we just pulled them out from being stored in the garage all summer and one of the nets was bent and broken! It wasn’t that way when we packed it up and I’m pretty sure we did it the right way. We stored them in the carrying bag they came with. I’m so sad we only got one season out of them! That’s too much money for one season. I’m super disappointed and so our my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M

customer_reviews.title: Huge packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty great product. I haven't used it on grass yet but I used it on concrete in my aunt's house & it was pretty good. The packaging was extremely huge though & I'd definitely recommend being home when it arrives because I wasn't & went to the post office & it came & an excessively huge rectangle box & it barely fit in my car. Whence you get it out though the bag that the goalie set comes in is pretty portable. It fits in the trunk if you have it acceptably organized. I'd recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Noisy Boy

customer_reviews.title: Terrific goals balancing easy of set up with sturdy construction.
customer_reviews.text: Pugg goals are incredible. Really easy to set up and take down and very sturdy. It comes with pre-attached stakes to hold it in place as well. They can be difficult to stick into really hard ground but are not necessary for the goal to function well. If you cannot get the stakes in, I recommend you simply throw a sports bag onto the back edge of the goal. One other thing to be aware of is that even after folded down, they are pretty large, so might not fit in the trunk of your car and need to go in the back seat. Still, absolute top quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up to get the fun started faster
customer_reviews.text: With virtual learning we’ve been playing soccer 1:1 with our 8 year old after lunch. This was a large upgrade from the snow shovels we were using to make goals. So easy to pop up and fold to store again. If it’s not windy you don’t even need to put the stakes in. Lightweight enough for our 8 year old to grab it and set it up for the fun to begin.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Quality goals that should last for many years
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a birthday present for an energetic 6 year old Grandson. He will share with his 3 year old Sister. Bought the 6 foot size so it would serve him well now and in future years. Thought he would outgrow the 2.5 or 4 foot sizes too quickly. He is an avid fisherman and football fan. His cousins all play soccer and I believe he will begin too in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry M Josephson

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to setup and take-down.  Very solid.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really cool. VERY lightweight. And easy to fold back up and store it in the garage. I even comes with a bag to keep it stored in. I don't stake it to the ground (although it comes with stuff to do that). I have a 4 year old a 2 year old, so we just use it basically as target practice. Doesn't matter if it stays in the exact same spot every time. But honestly, it doesn't get caught by the wind and moved very often. And it always stays upright, even when I kick a ball hard at it. I would buy another one. In fact, I probably will soon.
customer_reviews.author: Amy South

customer_reviews.title: Great and portable
customer_reviews.text: I am a major fan of the PUGG portable goals. I have a PUGG 4 foot portable already, and my kids are getting bigger. We decided to purchase the PUGG 6 foot, and it now made it even more fun for him to play with all of his friends. Such a great setup and pickup portable goal. Quality very well made and easy to transport.
customer_reviews.author: nvayupak

customer_reviews.title: Best Pop-up goals
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these for my soccer group and also other ones which are half the price of these. Puggs are the best by far and worth the higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Tariq Butt

customer_reviews.title: Trying to resolve an issue, but generally like the product
customer_reviews.text: We've had these for almost a year. They have had light/moderate use. I really like them. Small issue though and my review scores will change depending on the response I get from the manufacturer. One of the buckles that attaches the strap to the corners of the goal fell apart. I'm trying to contact the company to see about replacing just this part.
customer_reviews.author: R. A. Gala

customer_reviews.title: Tough, Durable and Easy
customer_reviews.text: Much easier to fold up than I thought they would be. My kids can set it up alone (9 and 12 years old). The bag and all components are high quality parts. The 6 ft goals are still large once folded up, but they are flat and can be slipped behind a cabinet or another thin, large space. Overall I'm glad I paid a little more for these than some of the others available online.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: Great for practice
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to practice soccer any weekend day she doesn't have a game. These portable mini goals take a bit of practice to fold up, but they're really easy to toss in the car trunk to take to the park and they've held up really well despite the fact she shoots the ball hard enough to put a hole in the wall. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Matt H

customer_reviews.title: Still going strong
customer_reviews.text: We bought these goals 4 years ago and have since used them every fall and spring multiple times a week. There are holding up like champs! I wish they folded just a bit smaller as it's a bit of a hassle to get them in and out of a smaller car's trunk, but it's not a big deal. I'd buy these again for the durability and ease of set up despite the size. The pegs are super helpful when it's windy out- which is a lot of the time here. Overall, great product.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Great little practice net
customer_reviews.text: I bought this net for my 8 year old son. He loves it! It is easy to open up as well as fold back up for storage. It has plastic pegs attached so that you can secure it to the ground. Just use caution when pushing them into the grass, if you hit any resistance (rock or root) pull it out and reposition. Because they are only plastic they can break easily. We broke one early on. The good news is that it comes with replacement pegs.
customer_reviews.author: S A. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Best training goals made
customer_reviews.text: PUGG Training Goals are simply the best thing going for soccer players. Our daughter uses them at least 3-4 times per week and they have held up for months! They are easy to fold up and place into the provided bag. High quality seams, netting and nylon along with the heavy duty spikes make these goals nearly indestructible. We have wasted money on several other types and finally decided to make the leap. Good to know we will not have to keep spending money on trash. Get the best first and learn from my mistakes!
customer_reviews.author: J Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and put away!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! We had large metal ones that I thought would work well to leave up, but they were a pain. These set up easy, stay in the grounds with the legs attached, and fold up easily! Perfect for kids to play!
customer_reviews.author: JCH

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product with rock solid reputation
customer_reviews.text: Coaches all over have used these goals for years for two simple reasons - they are durable and easy to use. And, by "easy to use" I mean they pack well, they are light, they can be used on any surface and they can stop hard shots and soft shots. The only downside I see is that the 6' goals, even when folded, can be tough to fit in the trunk of a small car.
customer_reviews.author: R. Thomas Bysshe

customer_reviews.title: Great goal
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly the same goal we use in my older son's 6U practice and games. The 8U uses the same size as well. My kids love it because they can score goals. I love it because it easy to setup and take down so I don't have a huge soccer goal sitting in my front yard. Its very high quality and also came with a nice carrying case and extra stakes. I thought it was pretty expensive but I'm happy with my purchase because of the portability and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: VBSurfer

customer_reviews.title: great net for the young kids
customer_reviews.text: Our soccer league uses these nets and I got a pair for home. They are durable, they have pegs to keep them on the ground even in decent winds. Once you get the hang of it, they fold quickly and compactly back into the original bag. This is actually a quite a feat, or maybe it's me, but I often have trouble getting folding equipment back into the original bag and these nets are no problem.
customer_reviews.author: G. Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Really worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: We use these every week for soccer practice and they are awesome. We try d a different style of soccer goals that weren’t pop-up bc I typically have a hard time twisting pop-ups to put them away. Those goals broke after just two seasons. These goals seem more durable and I haven’t had any trouble putting them away.
customer_reviews.author: Little Zooks

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, full-sized net stored in a little bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for when my grandson comes to visit because it doesn't take up a ton of space when stored. It's a full-size net, which is great. It's amazing how they can get such a big net into such a small, flat storage bag. But be sure to save the directions on how to fold it back up--it's really tricky. The first time we finally got it folded up, we didn't have a clue how we did it; had trouble the second time but paid attention to what we did and now can manage it pretty quickly...we do much better with two people folding it.
customer_reviews.author: Patt Hayes Heise

customer_reviews.title: Strings Started to Shred after one hour of first use.
customer_reviews.text: We used these for a training session for 5-6 kids 4 years old and all the way up to 14. They took a good punch, but after about an hour, the strings started to come undone on one end. Not sure if this is typical or not. They don't seem to stand up to much.
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: These goals are great
customer_reviews.text: We have a group of adults that play pick-up soccer every Sunday afternoon. If there are too many people, we break it down into smaller teams and play 5 v 5, and 6 v 6, etc... We already had two sets of PUGG goals, but wanted a third set so we could expand our games. These goals are great, very portable, and very rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this item
customer_reviews.text: We run a children's community soccer camp (Highpowersoccer.org) every year (in multiple locations) and these goals have been the best we have tried. We have used smaller, wire goals, pvc goals, and other nets (Franklin), but these are the best for several reasons: 1. Portability - we have carried them all over the state 2. Ease of folding - others crimp 3. Durability - no issues yet 4. Size - great for kids, and small games with teens 5. Versatility - we use them for other games too I would highly recommend these goals for practice situations.
customer_reviews.author: S. Grotzke

customer_reviews.title: So Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: We love that we can pull them out and easily put them away for storage. We often have a pack of kids at the house and we always throw these in the yard to play with, or use them for a friendly family game.
customer_reviews.author: M Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for any soccer coach!
customer_reviews.text: I coach a young girl's soccer team and these goals have been great. Easy to set up and transport and surprisingly sturdy once you stake them into the ground. Folding them back up can be a bit tricky but it's not to hard once you get the hang of it. Really a great value as well--I love them.
customer_reviews.author: M. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Great goals for practice
customer_reviews.text: These goals are great for soccer practice. They have the pegs attached at the posts and the back and hold up well to my son's 6-7 year old soccer team blasting away. I am glad I got the 6 ft. width. They take a little practice to fold back up at first (I watched a YouTube 30 second video to help), but once you figure it out they are a snap to twist and fold up and slide into the included bag.
customer_reviews.author: Leighann

customer_reviews.title: super easy and durable
customer_reviews.text: I have had pop up goals in the past that were difficult to put away. These are super easy. one twist and it is done. These come with 3 attached ground stakes and work pretty well. The lanyard on the stakes is made of bungee type material so when the balls hit the goal there is a little give to it and the goal snaps back into place. I have used these for about a month now in wet and muddy conditions. No material failures yet, no frays or broken items. The carrier bag has an adjustable strap for over the shoulder carry. I would highly recommend these to anyone that needs portable goals
customer_reviews.author: Keith D. Woltersdorf

customer_reviews.title: Folds for storage!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to young grandchildren and it is the perfect thing to keep them active! Is well constructed and folds for storage which is a big plus! I can foresee years of fun use with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Nama

customer_reviews.title: Great practice goals
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my youth soccer practices (U10). Exactly what I was looking for. The quality of the frame and the netting is top notch. Included in the package is several replacement parts, so that's a big plus. After a few sessions with these I'd absolutely recommend them. Worth the extra cost vs. some of the less expensive options.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Feely

customer_reviews.title: Great for Backyard Practice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this portable pop up goal set for my son (5 1/2). His soccer league uses the exact same goals and figured why not buy him his own set to keep at home so we can practice together. The goals are a great product, set up easily, and store well. It takes a few times folding them up to get the hang of it. Also PUGG provides extra pegs and straps w/ the set to be used in case in case of breakage or loss. I highly recommend this product if you have a young soccer player at home that needs or wants extra practice.
customer_reviews.author: Karma2Rats1S

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little goals with great features.
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome little pop up goals! They flip open very quickly and close up just as easily once you know what to do. The great thing is that there are little inserts to tuck away the stakes and tabs that tell you exactly where to place your thumbs to fold up the goal. I like that the stakes are attached to the goal and store in the goal also, so there aren't any pieces to lose. I returned mine to spend the money on a full size goal, but I really wish I had just kept these anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Love these...Perfect for practice
customer_reviews.text: The area that we live in has amazing fields for games, however they have really bad fields with broken nets for practices. Because there are limited goals for practice...everyone wants to practice on the same fields. We decided to invest in our own goals so that location was no longer limited by availability of goals. These are fantastic! The size is good for U10 (practice). Of course they are not the official game size goals but they are good enough to take shots on and focus kicks. The team is happy, and we are very happy with the choice.
customer_reviews.author: lmorning

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality and durability. Size is great for U6 and under. Only goals our soccer club uses for our U6 teams. Too small for older than U6 unless just for fun at home
customer_reviews.author: MDubs

customer_reviews.title: Great for backyards or practices!
customer_reviews.text: I use these DAILY for my high school soccer practices. This is great to buy for your home if you have small children. The nets can be difficult to fold at first but the more you use them the easier it gets.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Wooten

customer_reviews.title: 6' Pug
customer_reviews.text: Our soccer organization uses these Pug goals for short sided practice games. I liked them so much that I purchased them for my home. We can use them in the yard and they easily fold (twist motion, stands are tent-like) into the provided pouch so that we can place them into a trunk and take them to the park with us. In hind-sight I wish I had purchased the 4 footers instead of the 6 footers as they would be easier to travel with and be a smaller goal to aim for. There is nothing wrong with the 6 footers. They fit fine in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: GEANDSONS LOVE THEM.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these goals for my grandsons 11 and 8 years old. I bought it so they could play soccer in their backyard during socially isolating. They love them. They can open and fold them.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia T. Silverman

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy
customer_reviews.text: These are very durable. Very easy to carry and fold. I would highly recommend these goals for any level of play. I’ve had these over a year and they show no rips or holes.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Vail

customer_reviews.title: Great product for target skill
customer_reviews.text: Product is easy to use and allow for focused target training. Good quality and easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: EZ Up and EZ down. Just like you want.
customer_reviews.text: Had I known how easy these were to pop up and take down, I would have bought them 3 years ago. Using 3 times a week for about a month, no issues and the U10 kids love them. I bought the 6 footer. I can't imagine that the 4 ft would be big enough. If you are doing older than U10, I might splurge for the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: The Philistines

customer_reviews.title: Portable
customer_reviews.text: Good portable soccer goal! I use it when coaching youth soccer and also when playing with my sons in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: I can't speak to the durability of these, as I've only used them a handful of times, but for the price, they are fantastic. 1. Great quality for the price 2. Carrying bags are very space-efficient but seem a bit cheap 3. Somewhat tricky to put back into the bags, but once you figure it out, you got it 4. gooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaallllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllllll
customer_reviews.author: Mike Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great net! Very easy to set up or take down
customer_reviews.text: This net is fabulous. I am using it to hit practice golf balls. It works great. It is the most convenient net to set up and take down. About 3 seconds each and it has a very convenient case to store and carry the net.
customer_reviews.author: FSSFRED

customer_reviews.title: Durable and portable
customer_reviews.text: Love these goal nets! So useful for running drills, on field day at school, and anytime you want to have a spur of the moment pick up game!
customer_reviews.author: Jeel

customer_reviews.title: Goal itself is solid, but retention straps/pegs not great.
customer_reviews.text: Solid goal. Should last us years. but the weak sauce elastic straps have a hard time keeping it in place, and will tear off if pulled too hard. The plastic pegs are thick and sort of flimsy. Would prefer aluminum pegs and non-elastic nylon straps.
customer_reviews.author: Heather D

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to pop up. After figuring out how to fold it up it is also easy to pack away into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: GS

customer_reviews.title: Big, durable goals
customer_reviews.text: We set these up at both ends of our driveway. We leave them outside most of the time, and they are braving the elements well. They are sturdy, yet easy to move. I wouldn't have minded the smaller version since we are only playing with them at home, but our driveway is big enough to justify the size, so it's okay. This particular size is probably better suited for parks and team practices, but I would buy them again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: A. M. Paris

customer_reviews.title: Pop up - easy to put up and Store.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for the kids to play soccer in the park. Not having a lot of storage space these are perfect as they fold down and easily store in a case. One twist and they pop back up and are ready for a game. They are easy to put up and easy to store and also great to travel with so that you can have a pop up soccer game wherever you are from your back yard to the park.
customer_reviews.author: wbtimson

customer_reviews.title: Self-Esteem Booster
customer_reviews.text: The other day I was feeling pretty s***ty, my job was stressing me out, my boyfriend was being a complete tool and I needed soccer in my life. After playing for weeks without nets, I mean we were using bags, sandals, shirts, even someone's Chihuahua (god those dogs are so annoying), I decided to splurge on these nets. Here is what happened: 1. BOOOM, I scored so hard. The yellow just screams, get it in. 2. Confidence went up, I was owning the other team. 3. Killed it at work the next day 4. Upgrade to a better boyfriend who isn't a douche Good quality, good price.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Arciniega

customer_reviews.title: My favorite amazon purchase
customer_reviews.text: I use these goals a couple times a week for small pickup games, and I have enjoyed them a lot. They are a great tool for training and hold up quite well. The most valuable feature of this product is the portability. You can carry stock them in the bag provided, and they can be carried on your shoulder anywhere or stored quite easily. The product is sturdy and has held well against strong shots, but it does get knocked over with a well placed shot or strong winds.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah Shaikh

customer_reviews.title: Goal! Perfect for little soccer players in training
customer_reviews.text: Our Under 6 girls soccer team loves these and it has helped them to have a target other than cones to shoot at during soccer practice. I like that you can secure them to the ground as other brands are seen blowing over whenever a gust of wind hits the field. They are big enough to allow for their age. Well worth the cost and they come with a carrying case. Perfect for what we needed them for.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grammy of 5

customer_reviews.title: Unmatchable quality
customer_reviews.text: Pugg goals are the best, no question. Accept no substitutes. It took 15+ years of heavy use to wear out my first pair. They are still useable; they just don’t stay up well. I use mine for everyone from 5-25 yrs of age. You pay more for these, but the quality is unmatchable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product. My 9 year old son loves it.
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy and portable. Only problem is plastic stacks didn't last long. but other than that I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Technology Guru

customer_reviews.title: Pugg goals
customer_reviews.text: Best goals in the market ,, quick setup ,, quick breakdown ,, perfect for my u13 ,, and good for adult games ,, makes you pass around and work the goals in as oppose to just shooting into full size goals ,, develops skill
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Rated best Xmas gift by our grand children!
customer_reviews.text: This item is very well designed and solid. We had to return it in favor for the smaller size. We have grand children, ages 9 and 6, that had a hard time protecting the goal. So we replaced it with a 4 ft. wide and they love it! Easy to fold and store and take it to parks, beach, etc., or you can leave mounted 24/7 in the backyard.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kamel

customer_reviews.title: Great soccer nets
customer_reviews.text: These are great nets. I totally recommend the 6 foot nets over something smaller. My boys are 5 & 6 so this is the perfect size. They fold up easily after you figure it out the first time. I love that they come with a bag for storage. They have 3 pegs on each net that you can easily stick into the ground to keep the nets in place. We don't have much storage space so these nets were perfect for us.
customer_reviews.author: RLB

customer_reviews.title: Backyard soccer fun for all ages.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our 3 grandchildren and they love it. The oldest is 9. They haven't gotten the hang of putting it back in it's case yet so my daughter takes care of that chore. She is glad that we sent the larger 6' goal as it gives a increased chance of the ball going into the net.
customer_reviews.author: KRH

customer_reviews.title: PUGG, no brainer.
customer_reviews.text: Pugg goals are a no brainer purchase. I've had kids in soccer and coached for 12 years now and been thru lots of different pop up goals. Without a doubt, PUGG makes the best product on the market. If you are just getting started with soccer for your kids, buy these and be done buying anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Allie R.

customer_reviews.title: Goals!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome and perfect for practicing with my 8 year old.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, we are pleased with the goal. I very much appreciate that the stakes are tethered to the goal, so less likely to get lost, however the stakes are short and do not hold the goal in place even against a 10 year old's shot. But I suppose that if they were longer, I'd have to use a hammer to drive them into the ground.
customer_reviews.author: ChiRho4

customer_reviews.title: great size and storability.
customer_reviews.text: there's a bit of a learning curve learning how to break these down, buy once you get it, then you got. bag is a nice addition; i hang these on a hook in my garage when not in use. in terms of quality... these seem very durable and well constructed. i've purchased goals in the past that have been pretty cheap. these are very high quality materials and build construction.
customer_reviews.author: Buyin' Stuff

customer_reviews.title: so good. Had to leave a review to share how ...
customer_reviews.text: Just received these and so fsr, so good. Had to leave a review to share how easy it is for these to set up and take down. The only reason the are not getting 5 stars is because I fail to see how they're 6 foot!
customer_reviews.author: Just Me

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Have had 1 tear in 1 net out of 4 I bought but great value product. Happy I got these.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Best Pop Up Goals Out There!
customer_reviews.text: These goals are the best pop goals on the market. They are well made and very durable. I have one permanently set up in my basement and it has taken all kinds of abuse and is still in perfect shape. I think these goals are a must have for any soccer coach or soccer family. They can be a little tricky to fold back up and get in the bag but that should not deter anyone from purchasing them.
customer_reviews.author: Rockhopper2011

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up and so fun for kids AND adults!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great training tool
customer_reviews.text: Great product for soccer training. Have used these goals for years. Product is top quality and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Great goals
customer_reviews.text: The goals came fast and were perfect. They setup quick and easy. Removal is even better. one twist and they are done. Bag is great for carrying them. Probably the only thing I would gripe about is the plastic spikes. I can't see those lasting long, but we will see. I guess they were thinking safety of the kids. Wouldn't want the kids falling on metal spikes.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Many Ages
customer_reviews.text: I coach both kindergarten and third grade house league youth soccer and these goals work perfectly for both ages. They are the same size goals as my kindergarten kids use for small-sided 3 v 3 games, so it gives them extra practice with that size goal, and for the older kids who are used to playing on much bigger goals, it helps give them control and precision in their shot. Once they can score on a 6' goal, when they're looking at a 15' goal in a game it suddenly looks massive and is much easier for them to score. These goals are perfect for helping to achieve my coaching goals, helping kids to learn, improve, and have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Utech

customer_reviews.title: Good goals for the kids.
customer_reviews.text: Bough these as a present for our 2 year old son. These are sturdy enough to keep up with his somewhat rough play style and are of the perfect size for smaller children. Carry bag is convenient as well. I think they will provide us with plenty of great moments. Quality is right on - no obvious weak points, everything seems well designed and made. Like it!
customer_reviews.author: Yazon D. Alt

customer_reviews.title: Great for bubble soccer
customer_reviews.text: I run a bubble Soccer company and these are the most durable portable soccer goals I have found. They are easy to setup and are durable enough to withstand people falling on them!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette B.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy soccer goal
customer_reviews.text: We use these goals at home and, as a coach, I also take them to soccer practice. I like the bigger size. They get well used and hold up even with teens and adults shooting! You have to stake them in with the attached stakes provided for the goals to withstand hard shots. They fold up very quick and easy! I like that they came in a pair with a bag to store and carry.
customer_reviews.author: L Clark

customer_reviews.title: Second set, great goals
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to clean up. Just great goals.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: I love these goals
customer_reviews.text: I love these goals. These are the real deal, spend the extra few bucks and you'll be happy you did. My girls stomp all over them, fall on them and otherwise try to destroy them and there is no sign of any wear yet.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great product and exceptional customer service.
customer_reviews.text: They are sturdy and work very well. Collapse to reasonable size. Included carrier. 5 Starts not only for good product, but also customer service. One of mine snapped inexplicably with very little use and I sent an email, received a response in 24 hours, and after providing some pictures of the broken goal they sent out a new one free. That's the kind of service I wish I could get with every company.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Simple and durable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and no issues but the little nubs that fall off alittle to easy to hold the tension band.
customer_reviews.author: Musa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect small goals
customer_reviews.text: Best small-size goals out there. Easy to put up, put away, and store. Lightweight, so even kids can carry them. You can also put them side-by-side to increase the goal area if you want. We use these for our teams, social events, in the park, and in our backyard. Awesome for shooting accuracy. Well-made, high-quality product that I highly recommend for anyone who coaches or plays soccer.
customer_reviews.author: CPL

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but the netting material is not as ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good, but the netting material is not as strong as in my previous PUGG goal. I may have to sew up a rip after just one practice.
customer_reviews.author: Peter W. Hauer

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These nets are fantastic. I was looking for nets for my little boy that I could set up quickly and not be left out to be ruined by weather. These babies are easy to set up, sturdy and something easy to break out when his little buddies come over and decide they want to play soccer.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: Great product but the carrying case is really junky quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product but the carrying case is really junky quality and it's tough to fit the goals into it. Also there's no obvious place to store the stakes for transport. But, the main thing is, the goals themselves are great.
customer_reviews.author: Pine Spruce

customer_reviews.title: Puggs are great!
customer_reviews.text: I had been wanting some small goals for my kids who play soccer. Their coaches had these, so when I saw that they were reasonable priced, I ordered a set. They are easy to set up and put away. Each pugg has 3 plastic stakes that easily push into the ground to keep the pugg in place. They come with a convenient carry case. Very pleased with these.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: great fun, easy storage, and great price
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful nets. Our house is the place for the entire neighborhood to hang out in the summer. The kids have played hard with these nets for several months now and they are holding up great. The fact that they store flat in the included case is a wonderful bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: What a great purchase. Don't look at anything else.
customer_reviews.text: Spend the extra money for these. They are really really great. It changed my entire soccer practice with my U7 AYSO girls. They fold up very easily, had a great case and the materials seem to be made high quality. You can stake the sides and back too with the stakes that are ATTACHED to the frame, so you don't ever lose them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Goal!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my grandkids to practice their soccer BUT...it needs some tie down stakes so they don't blow over when there's a breeze or wind. Other than that they're perfect. Might want to buy a couple of tent stakes to use with these and then .... GOOOAAAAAALLLLLLLL!!
customer_reviews.author: TE Gale

customer_reviews.title: Love these goals!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our 4 year old grandson who is just starting soccer. I was a little worried about whether or now I would be able to close them up again, but I had no problem at all. We love playing soccer in his backyard and I look forward to taking these to a park when the weather warms up. They seem to be durable enough for him and the compactness makes them perfect for a house which doesn't have a lot of storage space for large, freestanding goals.
customer_reviews.author: Cultus Lake

customer_reviews.title: Good, reasonably rugged goals, good for younger kids play at campsites and parks...
customer_reviews.text: Nice, big, rugged enough, and with nice little features like the Velcro that holds them shut, and the hideaway stakes that are there and connected should you decide to bother with them. They have held up to little kids doing little kid things to them well (stomping them, lying on them, turning them into a "fort", etc....
customer_reviews.author: Mark McCorry

customer_reviews.title: Awesome portable practice goal
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, extremely portable practice goals. They both stand up to my U15 Boys team. The included stakes seem to work just fine, contrary to what others have posted. I imagine with looser ground they wouldn't hold, so have some simple tent stakes ready for use. Takes a few tries to figure out how to fold up, but once you have it down, very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Rik Thomas

customer_reviews.title: great goal
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest thing ever. It pops up in seconds and stores away nearly flat. We've had it up in our backyard for the last month and the tethers work great, even the windiest of days hasn't blown it down.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Great goals for pickup or practice
customer_reviews.text: These goals have been very handy when going to soccer practice or when I've gone to play pickup. They've lasted me a long time. The plastic stakes eventually break but you could go buy some sturdy tent stakes.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Hummell

customer_reviews.title: Kick Scooter is FUN, excellent quality and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two LaScoota Kick Scooters for my grandkids (age 4 and 7) and they love them! The light up wheels make it extra fun. Easy to assemble and the quality is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: JFC

customer_reviews.title: Pugg goal - 6ft pair
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to fold...here is a tip that helps close 100% of the time but not included by manufacturer...hold the white label "to Close TWIST this corner " in your right hand (not left) then try to fold...now my 10-yr old daughter and her grandpa can fold it with ease..voila!!!
customer_reviews.author: RajC

customer_reviews.title: They are easy to twist
customer_reviews.text: The whole family is enjoying these goals. They are easy to twist, fold and place in the bag and very light and portable. Any grassy area in a park instantly becomes a soccer field. Can't comment on it's durability yet. Have only used it for about a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amy T.

customer_reviews.title: The best portable goals we have found
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been a rec soccer coach for years - we have used other goals. There really is no comparison to the PUGG goals - they work - they fold up - and they don't break down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I am volunteering coaching my daughters soccer U9 team and these goals are perfect. They are easy to take out and put up. I bring them to every practice. The price was just right when I bought the, lower than anything else around. Once soccer season is over I will have a set of goals for my kids to practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: My luck one is gonna love it on Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Quick ship. My little one is gonna loved getting it on Christmas Morning. The setup is easy and the carrying case/bag makes transportation much more convenient. I don't normally use the included stakes for use at my home, but when we take it to the beach it is a necessity. It takes a time or two packing it up to master the twisting of the fiberglass poles. After that is is easy as pie
customer_reviews.author: Dee Collins

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good for practice but very small for players other than 4 - 6 year old beginners.
customer_reviews.author: No Name Joe

customer_reviews.title: Love soccer? This is a blast and worth every cent in fun factor.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Sets up quick, packs away easy and is a blast to play with. I am so happy with my purchase. It works great for practicing my accuracy and goalkeeper skills. I can't imagine how I lived so long without it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I buy them for our rec league, and they work great for our younger teams and they hold up well. Spend the extra to get a PUGG.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality and a right size for kids and even adults
customer_reviews.text: These goals are very well made, and conveniently fold away to not take much room in the garage. I had my friends over, and we played family-on-family scrimmages, these goals hold very well. The size is big enough for fun play, but don't expect them to be big enough to train your son's goalie skills
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Quality--works well
customer_reviews.text: This product works well--as advertised. The only possible downside is that the goals can be blown over by a moderate wind. It is certainly possible to anchor them down though so this is a small criticism. Otherwise, the 6-foot goals work very well for small-sided games; I am currently using them with U19 players. The workmanship and quality of the goals themselves is high; they can take a lot of abuse. A good product for soccer coaches and players--worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

product_meta.title: PUGG 6 Foot Portable Soccer & Football Goal Boxed Set
product_meta.description: The 6 Foot PUGG Pop-Up Goal is designed for maximum portability and performance. Its intuitive twist-to-close design folds down to a 1” flat oval, allowing it to fit compactly in its carrying case. Weighing only 7lbs on your shoulder, a pair of PUGG goals are ready for you to take the game with you - wherever you play.
feature_bullets: THE ORIGINAL - The PUGG goal is the original pop-up-goal created in 1984.
INCLUDES - Set includes 2 goals, pegs, a spare parts kit, and a carrying bag.
MAXIMAL PORTABILITY - Compact and lightweight design fits into a 32" x 40" carrying bag.
QUICK EASY SETUP - Sets up easily with a quick twist; collapses into 1-inch-thick flat oval.
EXTREMELY DURABLE - Each goal measures 6 x 3.5 x 3.5 feet (W x H x D) and works seamlessly on grass, sand, and turf fields.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
